title: Ep 56: The Judge Rogan Experience
description:
Today's proceedings:  We go over a guy who doesn't want to show his phone to gym employees, a person who likes getting "attention," a guy who thinks squash makes water taste good, and a listener asks if it was wrong to give an anniversary present to her partner.  Josh also performs his new hit single "Screw off, Christian" and Erika shares a story about a bug friend!   

Get your Sheesh Merch here!

http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod 

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Music by: Iván 

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg 

Logo/Designs by: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121 


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support
